resources.string: To scan the QR code the access to your camera is required. Please, grant the permissions through the Settings screen.\n\nSelect Permissions -> Grant permissions
The permissions to access the camera have not been granted. We cannot continue.
You have access to this device:\n\n%s
You can find the QR code on the device or in the instruction manual. It looks like this:
Setting up and adding the lock to your account.
Provided activation code is invalid. Correct it and try again.
Setting up and adding the lock to your account.
Guest user is only allowed to operate the lock and cannot change its settings.
Guest user is only allowed to operate the bridge and cannot change its settings.
Unknown error: Geofence services are not available now.
Geofence services are not available now. Go to the Settings>Location>Mode and choose \"High accuracy\".
Your app has registered too many geofence events.
Your app has provided too many intents to the geofence event.
* This feature is under development. We made it available to users to test and collect feedback.
All data associated with this device will be lost. Are you sure to delete the %s?
We could not add this device to your account. Check the internet connection and try again.
This lock runs on beta software. To add the lock to your account you should enable preview tester option in your profile settings.
This bridge runs on beta software. To add the bridge to your account you should enable preview tester option in your profile settings.
Auto-unlock is disabled because this feature requires background location permission.
Are you sure you want to log out? All your local data will be deleted. To keep using tedee devices you will need to log in again.
Device has been reset to the factory settings. In order to activate it, please add it again.
Permissions to location services are needed to access the Bluetooth scanner.
Please, grant the permissions through the Settings screen.\n\nSelect Permissions -> Grant permissions.
Hands full of shopping bags? Messy handbag? Thanks to the auto-unlock feature, the door will unlock automatically when you come back home.
Get notified when the kids get back from school. Unlock your door remotely if your guests arrive when you’re away.
Bridge is a Wi-Fi/Bluetooth router, which allows you to control your lock remotely.
Grant access to your family and friends wherever you are. If you rent your apartment, you can easily create admin or guest permissions for other lock users.
Unlock and lock the door from anywhere you are! All you need is tedee bridge and the app.
You can access the history of your lock events and receive notifications in real time.
Bridge is currently updating a paired device and can\'t perform this operation. Please try again later.
We could not delete the bridge. Please try again later.
Check if your device and Bluetooth connection are switched on and try again.
Please wait, the app is loading
Connection error. Please, check the internet connection and try again.
You have reached limit of mobile registrations, please contact our Customer Support.
To continue the process you will need:
Connect your bridge to a charger and insert the charger into the power outlet. The LED will start blinking.
Plug the bridge into the power outlet and wait until the LED blinks red - blue - green - white
Make sure the distance between the bridge and your smartphone is less than 2-3 meters.
This device is already added to your account.
Bridge must be connected to your local Wi-Fi. Please, provide your Wi-Fi SSID and password.
Loading error, please check your internet connection. Swipe down to refresh data.
Cannot find Wi-Fi network. Please, check its name (it is case sensitive) and try again.
The provided password is incorrect. Please, check the password and try again.
Bridge cannot connect to Wi-Fi. Please, verify its name and password and try again.
Bridge cannot connect to this Wi-Fi. It\'s an open network and does not require a password.
Bridge cannot connect to this Wi-Fi. It\'s secured and requires a password.
The bridge has been added to your account but still requires configuration.
Configuring and adding bridge to your account.
The bridge has been successfully added your account and is ready to use.
Bridge was not able to connect to the internet. Sometimes it may take longer than expected. If you continue the bridge will try to connect in the background. In the meantime check if:
Press and hold the button for a few seconds until 3 red blinks and release it.
Unplug, wait 10 seconds, plug it again into the power outlet and wait for red - blue - green - white
Press and hold the button until the LED lights up red
Release the button, 3 red flashes will confirm the factory reset
You can add the device to your organization, or you may skip this step.
You don\'t have any paired devices. If you add them, you will be able to connect to the devices over the internet.
Bridge couldn\'t connect to the device within expected time. Sometimes it may take longer. If you continue, the bridge will try to connect in the background. In the meantime check if:
Bridge is plugged into the power outlet and connected to Wi-Fi
To pair device with the bridge you must add it to your account first.
Unpaired device will not be available over the internet anymore but you can still connect to it using Bluetooth.
We could not unpair these devices. Check your internet connection and try again.
This device is already paired with another bridge. Do you want continue and pair again with this one?
We could not pair these devices. Check your internet connection and try again.
OFF when locking and unlocking for this user is allowed only locally, while in the Bluetooth range
You have to choose a person you want to share access with.
E-mail address seems to be invalid. Please, check it again.
This user has already been invited.
Add a new device and manage it through this app.
We couldn\'t refresh your device list. Please, try again later.
Your invitation is pending, the user hasn’t accepted it yet.
Do you really want to delete this user?
Do you really want to delete your access to this device?
Try to unlock or lock your door.
We are not able to calibrate this lock over the bridge, would you like to calibrate it over Bluetooth?
Turn the lock manually to fully locked position (deadbolts should fully extend) and continue the process by pressing the button below.
Turn the lock manually into fully unlocked position and continue the process by pressing the button below.
If you don’t have a door handle outside, the lock may automatically pull the spring latch while unlocking. You may change it later in the lock settings.
Could not update device. Try to reset it, if the problem persists.
Internet connection is necessary to complete the firmware update process.
Bluetooth has to be switched on to complete the firmware update process.
Could not update device. Make sure it\'s switched on and try to restart if the problem persists.
You cannot start a new update because another device is updating now.
Turn OFF Bluetooth for at least 10 seconds (in the settings, not in the Control Center), turn it back ON and try again.
Please, stay in Bluetooth range during the entire update process.
Please wait a moment, the bridge is now self updating.
Please wait a moment, bridge is currently updating this device.
Bridge will try to install this update later tonight. You can update it now by tapping the button below.
%1$s granted you access to the device ‘%2$s’
There is software update available for ‘%s’
Do you want to commence auto-unlock for %s?
Do you want to start Auto-unlock for %s?
Auto-unlock started for ‘%1$s’. Process will be automatically cancelled at %2$s.
Auto-Unlock requires Bluetooth connection. Please, turn ON Bluetooth in the system settings to Auto-Unlock \'%s\'.
Auto-Unlock require Bluetooth connection and Location. Please, turn on both of them in the device settings to Auto-Unlock \'%s\'.
Process cancelled for ‘%s’, because you have left the auto-unlock zone.
Process cancelled for ‘%s’, because it\'s been unlocked manually.
Process cancelled for ‘%s’. Some other user has already unlocked this lock a while ago.
Process cancelled for ‘%s’, because you reached the lock too fast.
Process cancelled for ‘%s’, because lock is already unlocked. If you want to pull the spring at Auto-unlock, enable \"Pull spring\" in settings.
You can find the activation code on the device or in the instruction manual. Scan the QR code or type it in.
Provide device activation code. You can find it on the last page of the instruction manual and on the device.
Activation code is a %d characters long code\n(e.g. ABCD1234EFGHIJ)
Your device does not support scanning QR code.
The name must be longer than 2 and shorter than 33 characters.
Are you sure to delete your account and all associated data? You will not be able to use your devices any more until you add them again.
All devices you own will be deleted and users will lost access to them. Confirm by typing in your e-mail.
We could not delete all your account data. Please try again later.
All your data is being deleted. It may take a while. Please, wait until you\'re automatically logged out.
Press and hold the button until LED starts blinking and release it.
Make sure the distance between the lock and your smartphone is less than 2-3 meters.
Have you already installed your lock?
The lock has been successfully added to your account and is ready to use.
Lock is busy and cannot be calibrated. Make sure not to turn the lock or move the door and try again.
Cannot calibrate the lock, restart the device and try again.
Sorry, we could not prepare the lock for calibration. Please, check the Bluetooth connection and try again.
This device is already registered by another user. Please, delete it from the other user\'s account first and try again.
The maximum calibration time of 5 minutes has passed.
Unlocked and locked position are the same. Please, calibrate the lock again.
The lock has been added to your account but you need to calibrate it before it\'s ready to use.
Put the lock on the table vertically, with the button facing up
Wait 5 seconds for 3 fast red flashes
Put the lock in vertical position with the button facing up
Press and hold the button until the red LED lights up
Release the button, 3 red flashes will confirm the process
You can share access to your lock to someone via e-mail. Invited person will get instant guest access. You can manage it later in device sharing settings
This is an optional configuration, you can skip it for now, and set up this features later in device settings
The operation cannot be completed, please check:
you can open the lock with a key without resistance.
Lock is busy and cannot perform this action now. Make sure not to turn the lock or move the door and try again.
Operation may not have been executed over the bridge. You can try again using Bluetooth connection.
Pull spring latch is not calibrated
To pull the spring latch, please calibrate it from the lock settings page.
Operation cannot be completed. Please try again.
You are allowed to control this lock only locally. Make sure you are in its Bluetooth range (about 3 meters) and try again.
If you turn this option ON, your door will be unlocked automatically when you come back home and enter the Bluetooth range of the lock. It may take up to 15 seconds to unlock the door.
* We still develop this feature to work better. We aim to unlock your door just before you reach the doorknob.
If your door doesn’t have a handle from the outside, the lock may automatically pull the spring latch when unlocked.

It\'s very useful when you want to leave and lock the door behind you. Just press and hold the button until the LED blinks blue. Close the door behind you and it will be automatically locked after time you set up.
Auto-unlock cannot be enabled because it requires the Location set to \"Always\". Change the Location in System Settings and enable it again.
To enable auto-unlock in the background, you need to set location access to \"Always\" in System Settings.
This feature will not work until you grant permissions to the location services. You can grant permissions in System Settings > tedee > Location > Always.
To use this feature, pair this lock with the bridge, otherwise it will not work properly.
Choose device location on the map and confirm by pressing the button.
Failed to fetch your location. Choose your location manually.
You have changed the advanced settings. That may cause issues in other settings. To avoid potential problems use “Set default”.
Here you set for how long the auto-unlock should stay active. If you enter Range In zone and reach the door after given time, the lock will not unlock automatically.
Lock the door automatically when the lock is in semi-locked position.
Lock the door automatically when the lock is in unlocked position.
Time you need to exit the apartment and close the door behind you after you initiate lock-with-delay procedure.
The door will be locked automatically after specified time.
The name should be at least 1 and no more than 32 characters long.
We could not delete the lock. Please try again later.
Turn Bluetooth on to connect to this device.
Turn the Bluetooth on if you want to use the auto-unlock feature.
Switch the location services on if you want to use the Auto-unlock feature.
Turn the location service on to connect to this device via Bluetooth.
Open the door and unlock the lock before you start the calibration. Remember not to block the lock or press the door handle during calibration. If you\'re ready press the button and wait.
The calibration time has passed. Please, go back and start the process again.
Calibration cannot be completed. Make sure not to touch the door handle and try again.
If you cancel the calibration, pull spring feature will be disabled. You can enable it again in the settings. Do you want to disable pull spring?
Enable device logs only if you are aware of the procedure. It will broadcast sensitive data from you device over an insecure channel. Device logs will be enabled only for 15 minutes.
Do you want to clear logs?
Add a new lock using tedee mobile app
Do not move your door or touch the lock
The operation can\'t be completed. Please, check if you can turn the key in the lock cylinder without resistance.
To activate it again, refresh devices list on tedee mobile app.
Open tedee mobile app and log in again.
You haven\'t configured any locks for this widget, add them first
To connect to your lock in the background, you need to change the location permissions to \"Always\" in System Settings.
Log in to the application to use the widget.
You haven\'t configured any actions for this widget. Please, add them
Double click the button to unlock
Check if your Bluetooth connection is switched on and try again.
To connect and control this device remotely you need to pair it with the bridge first.
Make sure the distance between the lock and your smartphone or the bridge is less than 2-3 meters.
Bridge requires internet connection. Go to bridge settings > Wi-Fi and update the connection data.
Cannot open battery saving settings, please do it manually!
To improve auto-unlock operation please turn off the battery saving/optimization mode
You can change notification settings for individual device on its settings page.
Turn it on to select notifications you want to receive.
These settings will override the global application settings.
You will not receive any notifications for this device.
We have released a new version of the application. Stay up to date and download it from the Store.
Turn on the \"beta tester\" then devices you own will get new firmware update earlier and you will be able to turn on app preview features if available.
There is nothing to test in current application version.
Session expired, tap here to sign in
If you turn PIN code authentication on, you will be able to log in with the PIN code or biometrics.
Important: Auto-unlock and the widgets will continue working without entering PIN code.
After turning biometrics on, you will be able to log in using fingerprint or face recognition stored in your smartphone. You can still log in with the PIN code you defined earlier.
Provide new PIN code (5 up to 8 digits).
To change your PIN code, you need to provide current one.
Now define new application PIN code (5 up to 8 digits).
To disable PIN code, you need to provide your current PIN.
To disable biometrics, you need to provide your current PIN.
To enable biometrics, you need to provide your current PIN.
Biometrics not available. Make sure they are turned on in system settings.
Log in using your biometric data
To enable this function, authenticate with your biometrics data.
Provide your PIN code. Forgot your PIN? Log out and log in again.
Provide your PIN code or log in with biometrics. Forgot your PIN? Log out and log in again.
To use biometrics you need to provide device password.
Too many incorrect attempts. Try again after a while.
When turned on you will have to hold unlock button for one second, to unlock your device.
Lock was unlocked by someone else
The auto-unlock function has not yet been activated.
Add this lock to Home app and control it from all your Apple devices.
This feature will not work until you grant permissions to the Home app. You can grant permissions in System Settings > tedee > Home data (enabled)
We are configuring your lock to add it to the Home app
We are adding your lock to the Home app
We have found that you have more than one home. Choose where to assign your lock
Your lock has been added to Home app.
